schema.name: healthyfied japchae

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Organic Green Peas under cold water.
Beat the Egg with 1 pinch of Salt and a 1/2 tsp of ground Black Pepper.
Rinse the Shirataki Tofu Spaghetti under cold water and drain well.
In a skillet, heat the Butter over medium heat and cook the Egg to make a thin omelette, then slice it into strips, approximately 5 minutes.
In the same skillet, add the Sesame Oil and saut√© the Garlic and Red Onion until soft, approximately 8 minutes.
Add the beef strips and season with the remaining Salt and Black Pepper, cooking until the beef is browned, about 10 minutes.
Combine the Shirataki Tofu Spaghetti, cooked beef, egg strips, and Organic Green Peas in the skillet.
Pour the Coconut Aminos over the mixture and toss well to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, ensuring the flavors meld together.

schema.description: Indulge in a healthy twist on the traditional Korean favorite with this Healthyfied Japchae recipe. Packed with high-protein beef strips, high-fiber shirataki tofu spaghetti, and a variety of flavorful ingredients, this dish is perfect for those seeking healthy recipes without sacrificing taste. The use of coconut aminos and organic green peas adds a unique touch to this nutritious meal, making it suitable for health-conscious individuals looking for high-sodium options.
